comment._content:
I think this is a C-54 Skymaster
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/kukulu21/3376411308/]

comment.author: 62550845@N07
comment._content: Wrong. This is the much bigger C-74 Cargomaster!

comment.author: 27000124@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/62550845@N07/] To start with there's no such thing as a 'C-74 Cargomaster'. If you are referring to the C-74 'Globemaster' you will find the loading doors are in front of the wings while the C-54's loading doors are behind the wings.
